name: Suture
description: Suture's face is a canvas of old burns and new scars, punctuated by a single, multi-spectrum optical implant that hums faintly. A worn, grease-stained lab coat, haphazardly patched with mismatched tech fabric, covers their gaunt frame, hinting at a life spent in the shadows. Their presence is a quiet hum of weary competence, always observing, always calculating.

flavor.rationale: Suture operates out of necessity in the grim, overlooked sectors of the city, far from corporate-sanctioned clinics. Their illicit medical expertise is crucial for those suffering from the physical ravages of the leaking Matrix or the brutal realities of street life, ensuring the downtrodden have a place to mend when official channels fail and corporate surveillance makes legitimate care dangerous.
